comments:
Workbench build 200403100800

When you go "Help->Help Contents", you get 12 identical exceptions (bottom of 
this bug). 11 identical exceptions are coming from Hyades and the other is 
coming from EMF. (I will log bug against them too)

I have narrow the exceptions to EMF and Hyades by process of elimination of 
plugins.

Here are the exception:

The Hyades (version 3.0.0) build ID is: 20040211_1743 
I see these exceptions in the .log in the workspace\.metadata directory

This is a workbench problem, not Hyades specific. Need to reassign to
appropriate owner.
Please reopen for eclipse.org.

Thanx.

Reopening the bug since the exceptions were traced to Hyades.

More info:  the documentation of Hyades have not changed from the previous 
version.  So something has probably changed in the eclipse.help.internal.toc 
from Eclipse 2.x to Eclipse 3.0
